articles.description: The pacer shared a picture from a hospital bed on Monday and tweeted an emotional note, giving fans a major update on his participation in the Ranji Trophy. | Cricket
articles.content: India pacer Khaleel Ahmed shared a message for fans, where he revealed that he will be missing a good number of Ranji Trophy matches in the season, which started from Tuesday. Khaleel informed that h… [+1882 chars]

articles.author: Firdose Moonda
articles.title: Festive season comes alive as cricket's most abrasive rivalry resumes - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: They're like oil and water, they're the top two teams on the WTC table, and their meetings usually fill both ends of the newspaper. What more can you ask for?
